text: Grandpa Never Lies is a children's book written by Ralph Fletcher with pictures drawn by Harvey Stevenson. It was first published in 2000. ==Plot summary== A young girl describes her special bond with her grandfather over four seasons. The Grandfather tells creative stories in answer to her questions. Each story is followed by her saying "And Grandpa never lies, so I know it's so". Then Grandma suddenly dies and the little girl and her grandfather are sad and comfort each other. ==Notes== ==References== * * ==Other websites== *Ralph Fletcher's website Category:American children's books Category:2000 books Category:Books by Ralph Fletcher
